issue.title: [CF 1321] Separate bar textures per group
issue.body:
TellMeWhen 8.1.2

Requesting the ability to change the bar texture by group as opposed to globally. Now it is an official request so you can't be stubborn and ignore it any more.


> Posted by CurseForge user v1perz53 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1321 | Raw

comments.body:
Wow, what a great and revolutionary idea! I'll get on this right away!


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
